Statham Holding Off a Meg with One Leg produced again, the pitch on the Laugh. üòÇü§£Overall, I haven't laughed so Much like that in a while. What a Watch.

title: The move of the Year
text:
Amazing movie. Don't remember a time having this much fun. The production, the actors, the story, the graphics. I want to watch it again. This was better than any Jurassic World, Fast & Furious and all the Marvel and DC movies.I don't know what else to say. Don't understand the low rating really. What were you expecting from a shark movie PEOPLE?I don't understand why It needs to be 600 words. I said all I wanted to.I had fun. Good move. What I wanted. Meg 3 please. Amazing, 10 10 10 acres the board. Lalalalakaallaallaal me Meg Meg Meg
Sksjsjsjsjdjdjdjdjdjdfndndndndndndnsndndndndjdjdjdjdjdj.

title: Dumb but so much fun
text: The Meg 2 is one of the dumbest movies I've ever seen. I absolutely loved it!Of the two movies I went to this week, Barbie was without a doubt the "better" film. Better acting, better directing, and the writing was far, far superior.But it wasn't as fun as The Meg. And it helped that The Meg wasn't so dumb as to be distracting. It wasn't Sharknado, or a Troma film or anything like that.It's like Jurassic Park/World but in the ocean. I just wanted to see some big sharks eat people, and it delivered.I also recommend seeing it in 3D. They really pushed it out there to the point that a dragonfly looked like it was flying over my toes.

title: MEG is for Men
text: NO SPOILERS: I saw MEG 2 in 3D the other day and it was fun. If you're a MAN and your WOMAN forced you to sit through that pink BARBIE flick that made you feel guilty for being born a man, this is the film to make up for that. This modern-day JAWS is packed with non-stop action under and above water throughout the whole film. It's Jurassic Park at Sea World. This film is a sequel, but it doesn't matter if you saw the first film, it completely stands on its own, yet if you have seen the first one, this one has WAY more action, they bring back a few of characters, they kill some off and you'll get a few extra laughs that will fly over some heads. To ALL the ladies out there, in Barbie, we men got Margot Robbie, in this film, you get Jason Statham. The movie is a typical fast-food action thrill ride that will have you wondering why you had to pay for the whole seat, when you will only need the edge.

title: Fun for the fam
text: If you know what to expect then this movie is a treat. Definitely don't go in expecting it to be realistic or scientifically accurate.The villains were such bad-good over-actors that it really was only borderline annoying. The villains gave the plot the illusion of an antagonist storyline, which was enough to bolster the plot and help it get forward momentum.I was impressed by the main cast, they honestly did a great job.I love this movie for what it is. It's a fun movie for the family with enough adrenaline-inducing action to keep everyone interested. This movie is great for anyone who is even remotely interested in dinosaurs or sharks, but it's a treat for anyone in your family who is a fan of megalodons like my kids and I are.

title: Action packed
text: Meg 2: The Trench: Action PackedBen Wheatley directs this action packed sequel, starring Jason Statham from The Expendables and Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw.Jonas (Jason Statham) takes a crew down to explore uncharted waters in the bottom of the ocean. The sea life is colorful yet dangerous. During their research they learn about the betrayal among their team. Meanwhile, the trench is breeched, and many dangerous creatures escape.Predator and prey relationships are established in the killer opening scene. Three Megs, a giant octopus, Mini-megalodons, that look like dogs who can swim and walk on land, and fighting between Statham's team and the traitors, provides all the nonstop action.Statham does an exceptional job playing the hero, as he wants to keep his team safe. Especially Meiying, who he takes care of since her mom is no longer around. His action scenes are spectacular as well, he makes bombs, gets into gun fights, and battles three Meg's on a Jet Ski, which is all very intense. Shuya Sophia Cai plays Meiying, a determined 14 year old. She just wants to prove herself as a scientist, that's why she sneaks onto the submarine. Jonas obviously isn't happy about this, but since they get stranded at the bottom of the ocean, there's not much anyone can do about it.The cinematography by Haris Zambarloukos was incredible. The way the scenes were shot, adds intensity and intrigue, which leaves the audience on the edge of their seat. Zambarloukos attached a camera to Statham's Jet Ski and just added the shark in later, that's some good teamwork. In addition, Statham also performed his own stunts, which is impressive. The designs of all the different creatures, is very creative. Meg 2: The Trench is an action packed sequel, waiting for thrill seekers to go see it in theaters.

title: SHARK BEAUTIFUL FILM MAKES ME WANT TO DUMB MY GIRLFREND FOR THIS MASTERPIECE
text: An absolutely amazing job to enjoy it and get a better chance than just stay in there Meg. Yeah I loved it because there was a shark and I love them. I love shark soup and will change my addiction to dressing as a furry to be being an inflatable Meg. I thought that the Meg looked decent they should have soup made out of it. The Meg ate a lot of Chinese people. So it will add flaver beceause Chinese people taste like prawn crackers. Beautiful. The movie looks good but it is really nice and I love the way it is going on to the west side story of my daughter in the sun lol and yeah yeah that's cool yeah.

title: Saw in 4DX in the last few hours which is like a rollercoaster
text: Surprisingly better than part 1, a lot more action, more goofing around, awesome moments, and Jason Stratham making a lot more use of his professional swimming skills! Meg 2: The Trench is a lot better than the 1st one provably the only aspect I don't like is how the sharks looked worse otherwise every other aspect was great. The most packed audience I've seen for a 4DX film that was nice everyone else had fun too. This isn't meant to be taken seriously it's truly just epic entertainment for 1 hour 55 minutes. Somehow this seemed better written the 1st one was and not as many mistakes highly recommend this blast of an action extravaganza!

title: On the edge of my seat!
text: I was so ready to see this movie! Love just about any movie with Jason in it. It's always so unrealistic but it raises the anxiety levels to the max! In the first movie, yes a few good surprises but the second movie was just filled with them. One punch after another! They just kept coming. Adrenaline filled, action packed. I absolutely love the amount of action Page Kennedy's character got to contribute to his role. It was fun and always added a good laugh.I personally hate sharks. I'm petrified. But I love to watch them on the big screen.I did give it an 8 because of how many "oh common!" Momentsbthere was.

title: I love this movie ‚ù§
text: If you liked the first one, I'm sure you'll love this. More of the same but bigger, more thrills, spills, laughs & giant chomping sharks. My kids (5 & 8) liked it just as much, laughing and shrieking throughout.Forget the official 'critics' - they simply can't process movies like this. It's a good ol fashion actioner where good guys battle bad guys and monsters of the deep to save their friends and sundry extras. Did I mention there's also giant chomping sharks? That's it. Forget the official 'critics' - they simply can't process movies like this. It's a good ol fashion actioner where good guys battle bad guys and monsters of the deep to save their friends and sundry extras. Did I mention there's also giant chomping sharks? That's it.

title: I love you Jason Statham ‚ù§
text:
This is one of those times when people say you can't beat the original and this is one of those times, Meg 2 was nowhere as good as the first! The CGI of the Sharks was incredibly bad, and the plot was just everywhere if you even call it a plot.Like I was waiting and wishing for more shark attacks like the first movie but we just got the 'evil guys' sabotaging and attempting to kill Jonas (Jason Statham) like it's not meant to be another gun action film, and for some reason, it was sci-fi as well with dinosaur creators in it...
My advice to anyone who is thinking about watching this movie, DON'T! You don't even see the shark that much compared to the first film and the plot is so boring.

title: Jason Statham good actor
text: You go to a Summer flick like Meg 2 expecting mindless action, but this sequel emphasizes the mindless while relying on very bad CGI for the action. It is a passable production as a popcorn movie, but not much else.Jason Statham is his usual charming self, but early on its evident he did Meg 2 for the paycheck. This one is aimed at the Chinese market, apropos since it's primarily a Chinese production, and had a largely Chinese cast of heroes. That would be great if the story had something for them to do other than run around and comically react to monsters added in post production...or the practical effect Meg mouth with laughably obvious rubber teeth.This isn't art, and to its credit it doesn't try to be. It's just ridiculous, check your brain at the door Summer fun.Three stars.

title: This movie is totally amazing.
text:
Megalodon meaning "big tooth", is an extinct species of mackerel shark that lived approximately 23 to 3.6 million years ago, during the Early Miocene to the Pliocene,
Many think he no longer lives, I say he is wrong ... 5% of Earth's oceans have been explored and charted, especially the ocean below the surface. The rest remains mostly undiscovered and unseen by humans.If you tell me that in 95% there is no Megalodon, I would tell you that you are crazy ...
Who knows what kind of creatures exist in the depths, but we don't even know of their existence, we try to go and explore space, other planets, galaxies but we still haven't managed to explore our own planet ... that's not funny? :D
The film is very good action over the top, Jason Statham with a very good performance, impressed me in this film!However, I don't think that one man could kill a megalodon, but I also liked the movie when they found out that there were two of them, it was gorgeous!

title: Very Interesting Movie
text: Never seen the first film, so went in blind. I love ridiculously over the top, dumb action films with Jason Statham. And this did not disappoint! Some really good action moments and the giant ancient shark was really incredibly done. One of the better shark films in recent memory. You come to see Jason Statham once again take on a megalodon shark in MEG 2: THE TRENCH, and that's exactly what you get (eventually). I was hoping Ben Wheatley would bring more creativity to this absurd sequel but those coming in without any expectation other than seeing another cheesy B-level monster action movie will probably get their fill. ü¶à

title: LOVED JASON IN THIS.
text: I thoroughly enjoyed this movie!I was honestly surprised by how much I loved it, but I think it's because this one started out action-packed and immediately drew you into the tale in a way that I found refreshing and fun! It was actually a better film than the first one and I was very impressed with Jason Statham's acting in such a caring and protective role where he was pure of heart and conviction while still smart and adept as always. It was thrilling to see him tackle a megalodon shark in the way he did and I was also really impressed by the entire crew.There were some refreshingly funny comedic scenes and the use of a .50 caliber in impractical but effective ways. I was both on the edge of my seat and laughing my head off on the random and truly never knew what to expect next.There were even a few jump scares that caught me entirely off guard but were welcome thrillers to offset some of the more serious moments. It had heartwarming love and connection at the core of everything.Still, the story pushed forward to also give emphasis to the importance of respecting nature and mankind's obsession with greed constantly getting in the way of coexistence with the other entities that share our space. IIt was an epic movie, and I would like to say it is one of my favorite films featuring Jason in a lead role - hands down!

title: Very Good fun summer Movie
text:
Very Good fun popcorn summer Movie
I don't know what's wrong with these other reviews giving it a 1 or 2 rating, these people wouldn't know how to rate a movie if their lives depended on it. This movie was action from the gitgo, special effects were awesome, story line spot on, acting was 9.5, humor was throughout the movie. And I am one to concede where a movie loses credibility, even a scify movie, if there's a spot that shouldn't be there or could of been done better I'd say so, but this movie DID NOT loses credibility at all. Go and see this fun flick, and enjoy no story but entertaining!!

title: Funny!
text: I really enjoyed this movie. Please don't take it seriously, it's a no-brain funny movie to watch.The story is good and the actors are funny.If you want to watch a serious movie, you better skip this one, but if you just want to watch something without having to think about anything, go and watch it.The visual effects are not so bad and the script is okay.I always enjoy seeing actors that are playing big guys in serious movies taking the chance to be ridiculous.Give it a try and you will laugh and have a good time.There is a lot of action during the entire movie.Enjoy it with a big popcorn!

title: Enjoyable for possibly all the wrong reasons
text: My memory is poor, but with only a few exceptions I think the first one was presented as within reasonably plausible.This one was beyond outlandish for the realm of plausible.So for presuming it's plausible this movie failed horribly.If not though, and we put this movie in the genre of titles like Sharonado, this movie absolutely killed it. It was a laugh a minute if you look at it as if it was laughing at itself with you.The special effects were great for the latter genre and sort of knowing nothing was out of bounds plot wise, it only got better and better trying to think up what might come next.I'm eagerly waiting to see what the next one brings.

title: Its fun
text: Its not that bad, If u want to watch something that makes sense and gets u thinking I recommend u skip on this one but if u just want to watch something fun and rot away I recommend giving this a go haha, Movies are meant to be enjoyed and I had a pretty good time watching this with my grandma, I understand why people are hating on this bcs cmon now this was so messy and lowkey horrible but who cares, I had fun, I love dinosaurs, jason and huge sharks so how could I hate this, This movie is so bad it makes it kind of good, It was honestly pretty fun just questioning the entire movie and calling it awful every chance I got, If u want a basic brain rot movie to watch late at night, watch this Its bad sure, but its good enough to give it a go.

title: Too good of a movie for the subject matter.
text: This has a budget. I'm used to The Asylum films and similar where it's mega shark vs mecha shark or some such nonsense. This wasn't stupid enough to be a great film. It was too well made. Then again it was pretty stupid in parts but overall a pretty decent film.The underwater stuff was interesting. The villain was an imbecile I was glad to finally see die. The kid was annoying. The sharks were menacing. I think it ticks all the boxes.Plenty of action, great CGI unless they were real sharks and they trained them really well. I found this to be entirely watchable. So many movies are truly so bad as to be unbearable viewing. This was a good movie.

title: love these characters
text: I love this cast and I love these characters so much! This movie was a mix between some perfectly timed comedy, heart pounding action, and terrifying ocean creatures.Love these ridiculous movies so much, I don't care what anyone says. The cast really make these movies fabulous. They really go all in and they bring what could be a mediocre movie into an amzing one! Also, the music choices are also topnotch.I really wish I could have seen this in theaters, I bet it was even more amazing on a big screen! I really hope all the cast come back for another movie, I would see it in a heartbeat. One can hope!

title: Compare to the first Meg this is Wayyyy Better
text: The first Meg was too cheesy, bad script, lots of bad acting and overall boring for me but This Meg 2 is way way better upgrades of acting, scripts, storyline, action and its much more make sense compared to Fast and furious ridiculous action scene if i may say so. So Meg 2 is worth it as entertainment. Hopefully Meg 3 will be more entertaining and much more fun, good job Meg 2 love it so much. Megs is for me means Mega Shark although from wikipedia it means megalodon but its okay for me thinking it means megashak right? Okay hope its more then 600 words, because i just write this praise Meg 2 as its way better than the first one.

title: I liked this better than the first
text: I liked this one better than the first because there is more of a story and not just a big bad Meg. The action was great in this one as well. The storyline isn't spectacular but it's not meant to be. It's one of those movies that's a good popcorn movie. I didn't see it in theaters so it's probably better in theaters. But I still enjoyed it. Jason Statham is a great actor. I hope we get a third movie. The one thing I didn't like was just like the Jurassic World movies, the Megalodon is in captivity for research purposes. I don't like when franchises do this. Overall a solid movie and i recommend if you want a time killer.

title: Kaiju Fans Rejoice
text: Nearly perfect kaiju genre film. Silly, fantastical, monster mayhem. Storyline is limited which is always enjoyable in a monster movie. This could be the US's Godzilla. Megalodon's and kraken's, oh my! If you love the kaiju genre you must give this a watch. Statham is wonderful as the deadpan hero. If he dives into this character type he could become a mega-star version of Bruce Campbell. The tongue and cheek humor is very entertaining but I'm here for the monster fights. Conspiracy, violence, and KAIJU!!!!!!!! What more could you ask for?This adaptation of Steven Alten's novels sets the stage for kaiju American-style! I'm here for it!!!!

title: Great movie to watch and chill
text:
Really a nice movie
Movie was fun didn't got boring at any point
It didn't required to watch frist part of the movie so it becomes more comfortable to watch
Not so complicated or too much scientific pretty basic and simple story
Some points movie fall back were 1. Its frist half movie gave very less screen time to the meg itself but was pretty much worth it as it builts the story
2. There were no tragic truns as frist part so movie became bit less thrilling
But over all it does its job perfectly movie makes you laugh and also curious at some points
No problem with vfx or cgi
Music is also well done
Highly recommend and also a fun movie to watch and chill.

title: Whatever happened to Ben Wheatley?
text: I won't speak about this movie for what it really is. If it would have been made by an unknown yes man, a bootlicker director seeking recognition from big studio executives - bankers, lawyers from Wall Street who know NOTHING about art nor movie quality, but only stock market and gross, gross and...guss what? GROSS. If this huge garbage trash has been made by such a film maker from nowhere, or even from a huge crap maker such as Roland Emmerich or his "double" Michael Bay, I would not have been shocked. But this director Ben Wheatley was, so far, a film maker with his own style, horror movies with some kind of personal touch, very weird but interesting. Small budgets most of the time, very worth discovering.... So what was my surprise and my disappointment to find out that he made this sh.... So that's my question, what happened to Ben Wheatley?....Imagine Ridley Scott, Steven Spileberg or Marty Scorcese directing FAST AND FURIOUS.... You would not speak about the genuine film quality - or not - but aboout your SHOCK. Am I right?

title: I wasn't expecting much, but yikes.
text: The first one was really quite bad, but at least seemed self aware of its mindless creature feature nature. It still had the occasional jump scare and silly "so bad, it's funny" moments. This sequel has absolutely nothing going for it. I'm being generous with a 2/10. It was boring nonsense from beginning to end. Terrible performances across the board, worse than terrible writing with wall to wall cringe worthy dialogue... I get what they were going for trying to pack in other scary creatures but meh. Lame execution and didn't care enough about any single character to respond to what crazy thing was eating who.Maybe the stupid "Chomp On This" hip hop credits song would have been funny if any part of the movie had been remotely entertaining. Instead, it made it even worse because the confident tone of it only works if any part of the film had been successful and satisfying.Do not waste your time.
